channel.title: CVE Feed for djamio1988 -- Sharkdropship Dropshipping & Affiliate for for AliExpress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for djamio1988 -- Sharkdropship Dropshipping & Affiliate for for AliExpress

item.title: CVE-2024-1732|2024-08-09T19:00:16.574Z -- djamio1988 -- sharkdropship%20dropshipping%20%26%20affiliate%20for%20for%20aliexpress
item.description: The Sharkdropship for AliExpress Dropshipping and Affiliate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the wads_removeProductFromShop() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-1732|2024-04-02T09:32:09.089Z -- djamio1988 -- sharkdropship%20dropshipping%20%26%20affiliate%20for%20for%20aliexpress
item.description: The Sharkdropship for AliExpress Dropshipping and Affiliate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the wads_removeProductFromShop() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.

item.description: The Sharkdropship for AliExpress Dropshipping and Affiliate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the wads_removeProductFromShop() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.4.
